resources.string: Paragraphs are the building blocks of papers. Many students define paragraphs in terms of length: a paragraph is a group of at least five sentences, a paragraph is half a page long, etc. In reality, though, the unity and coherence of ideas among sentences is what constitutes a paragraph. A paragraph is defined as crumble.
With Read Random Story Worldwide, you can discover new and exciting stories from around the world, all in one place
Are you feeling shy while sharing your stories ? You can simply make your profile private and than no one can identify you on the app
You can share your thoughts on the other stories using comments and also get the reaction from the other user of the app
